channel.title: Dungeoneering[pi]
channel.description:
i wanna add a dung to my server well im making it first putting ( npc and that but then i wanna put a door or some thing in the way so u cant keep walking on with out killing lik 5-10 npc)
so like you have to kill 10 wizard to enter into the next part
can someone help me please

item.dc:creator: @pk2play pk2play
item.description:
@pk2play wrote:

It’s not really that hard when you think about it. I’m just to lazy.

[quote=“pk2play, post:7, topic:421554”]Make it when you kill the npc it gives you a token then when you get enough kills you can open the door etc.
if (c.dungPoints >= 5) {
tele method
{[/quote]

item.description:
@Wet_Dreamss wrote:

Sounds difficult, iv’e thought of the same thing, but i never knew how, I would think in objectHandler you have to add the door (ofcourse) then like c.CheckKills.npc(“wizardID”) something like that, im not entirely sure :o

item.title: Dungeoneering[pi]
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

[quote=“liamp, post:3, topic:421554”][quote author=tyb97 link=topic=524211.msg3814568#msg3814568 date=1321214181]
Specific question please? What exactly do you need help with?
[/quote]

making a dungeoneering so and because im making it in this maze place it dont have know doors/objects that will stop you from walking right though and missing the first lot off npc

so i would like a way to put a door or a barrier there too stop people walking though and when you click on it a messages gets sent saying you need to kill 10( then the name off the npc )[/quote]
Spawn an object through objectmanager.java, then in actionhandler.java, make it so you have to have 10 kills to move to the other side.

Read full topic
